data.title: Revco, Inc.
data.meta_description:
Revco, Inc. | 33 followers on LinkedIn. World-Class Products and a Relentless Passion for Outstanding Customer Satisfaction

Since 1968, Revco has been providing world-class products to the data processing industry. Our goal then, as it is today, was to introduce the latest, most innovative, cost saving products to our customers. 

Our No B.S.
data.text:
World-Class Products and a Relentless Passion for Outstanding Customer Satisfaction Since 1968, Revco has been providing world-class products to the data processing industry. Our goal then, as it is today, was to introduce the latest, most innovative, cost saving products to our customers. Our No B.S. "I Want You to be Completely Thrilled" Guarantee: “From start to finish, my goal is to make you completely happy with every aspect of your purchase. If at any time you are not thrilled with everything we do, from product recommendation to delivery and installation, I will personally l take the steps necessary to address your concerns and make it right or I'll gladly arrange to return the product and refund every penny.” See what some of our customers have said… “Bob helped us select the right product for our particular application. He really knows what he sells. This is why we always look to Revco first.” - Mike Musso, TIAA-CREF, Broomfield, CO “I have encouraged colleagues at other schools and businesses to look at products from Revco. Bob Von Stein is a pleasure to work with and he is diligent in providing the right solution. He takes time to listen to my issues and tries to provide the right fit. He then sees the project from start to finish with excellent follow-up and follow through.” - Peter Haffner, Tunxis Community College, Farmington, CT

Website

http://www.revco-inc.com

External link for Revco, Inc.

Industry

Computer Hardware Manufacturing

Company size

2-10 employees

Headquarters

Trumbull, Connecticut

Founded

1968

Specialties

Customer Service, Quality Products, KVM Switches, IT Management Solutions, High Performance KVM, Serial Console Servers, Control Room/NOC Console Furniture, ServerLIFT, Server Enclosures and Racks, Integrated IT Infrastructure Solutions, In-row Cooling & Aisle Containment, Rack PDUs, IT Environment Monitoring, Thermal Management Solutions, and Single- & Three-Phase UPS Systems
